1. InstallationÂ¶

  1. Have docker and python >= 3.12 installed.

  2. Clone the SandiaCA repository and go to the root directory.

  3. (Optional and preferable) Create a new python virtual environment.

  4. Install python dependencies as follows:

    (.venv) $ pip install -r requirements.txt

You are ready to use it. Check the usage guide next.
